name: A long way home (itch)
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 49
Theme: Unstable

Tips:

  • lower the sails during storms
  • use bucket to get rid of the water (bar on the left of your screen)
  • try to hit sharks before they bite your ship

You can also play with WASD
